Text: Today is a studio album by American singer Elvis Presley, released on May 7, 1975 by RCA Records.

Text: Today (Elvis Presley album):  The "Today" sessions were held in RCA's Studio C, Hollywood, Los Angeles, California, March 10–12, 1975, and marked the last time Presley would record in a studio.
